description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the remote code execution vulnerability in the Windows Mobile Broadband Driver, follow these steps:

1. Identify the correct version of Windows that your system is running.

2. Download and apply the necessary updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog based on your Windows version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 and 21H2: [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)

3. Restart your system to ensure the updates are fully applied.

**Details**:
This update resolves the incorrect access of indexable resources leading to a remote code execution threat. Users are advised to ensure that they have the appropriate version updates installed. 

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running the specified versions of Windows before applying the updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation.
